data.text: @SenToniAtkins I want SB866, SB871, AB1797, AB1993 and AB2098 pulled from all committees and effectively killed. I will pull our kids from school as soon as the first bill moves in a committee and they wonâ€™t return to school until all of the bills are dead. senator.atkins@senate.ca.gov

@SenToniAtkins Please pull these bills from their committees and kill them: SB866, SB871, AB1797, AB1993 and AB2098  or families and businesses will continue to move out of CA to preserve autonomy! Democrats are leaving the party because of all this covid overreach and overkill!

@SenToniAtkins California's draconian response to this virus was harmful to our lives, our economy, and our children.  Unemployment, drug abuse, and suicide rates shot up, children were robbed of their education and socialization.  Time to go back to normal, and not the "new normal".

@SenToniAtkins Please, Senator Atkins, it's time to stop pretending we have an emergency virus on our hands.  It's winding down, we have all been jabbed and/or got the virus, so plenty of natural and unnatural immunity floating around.  Time to let the narrative go.

@SenToniAtkins #Ukraine needs weapons and humanitarian assistance to defend against #Putin. Russian troops shoot a nuclear power plant. Stop innocent civilian deaths. People around the world ask NATO to close the airspace over Ukraine. @POTUS, provide #SafeAirliftUkraine
